titlestmt.titleproper: Guide to the Marketing Office, Yale School of Drama, Records
Marketing Office, Yale School of Drama, Records
titlestmt.author: compiled by Daniel Hartwig

publicationstmt.publisher: Yale University. Department of Manuscripts and Archives

profiledesc.creation: This finding aid was produced using ArchivesSpace on Friday January 11, 2019 at 09:33

did.unittitle: Marketing Office, Yale School of Drama, records

repository.corpname: Yale University. Department of Manuscripts and Archives

did.abstract: The records consist of marketing and publicity files, including press releases, clippings, photographs, posters, programs and newsletters documenting productions of the Yale School of Drama and the Yale Repertory Theatre.

odd.head: General note
odd.p: Forms part of Yale Record Group 22-E (YRG 22-E), Records of departments, offices, programs, and projects of the Yale School of Drama.

accessrestrict.head: Conditions Governing Access
accessrestrict.p: The records partially restricted. See inventory for details.

prefercite.head: Preferred Citation
prefercite.p: Marketing Office, Yale School of Drama, Records (RU 933). Manuscripts and Archives, Yale University Library.

arrangement.head: Arrangement
arrangement.p: The records are arranged by subject.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p: The records consist of marketing and publicity files, including press releases, clippings, photographs, posters, programs and newsletters documenting productions of the Yale School of Drama and the Yale Repertory Theatre.

did.unittitle: Publicity materials from the Marketing Office

accessrestrict.head: Conditions Governing Access
accessrestrict.p: The materials are open for research.
